title: Bee Cloak
summaries: The Bee Cloak is a Hardmode accessory that combines the effects of the Star Cloak and the Honey Comb. When the player is injured, three stars will fall on the player's current location and bees are released.

statistics.Tooltip: Causes stars to fall, releases bees and douses the user in honey when damaged
statistics.Sell: 3
